description: This file provides configuration functions for a frontend application to connect to a backend API, including URL resolution based on environment variables and heuristics, as well as header construction helpers for JSON and multipart requests.

methods.name: getApiBaseUrl
methods.description: Resolves the backend API base URL based on environment variables, current window location, or fallback to relative root.

methods.name: getDefaultHeaders
methods.description: Builds default JSON request headers, optionally including an authorization token.

methods.name: getMultipartHeaders
methods.description: Builds headers for multipart uploads, optionally including an authorization token.
